mapper.select: select seq_code AS code, seq_name, Seq_description as description, seq_sort_order as sortOrder, product_form AS seqString from sequence where seq_code=#{code};

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(code_value SEPARATOR ' ') AS result FROM common_code
AND section_id = "005"
AND code_id IN
#{seqItem}

SELECT t1.status AS category, t1.use_id as useId, CASE WHEN t1.status = 'C' THEN t2.comp_name WHEN t1.status = 'E' THEN t3.est_name WHEN t1.status = 'D' THEN t4.dept_name WHEN t1.status = 'U' THEN t5.user_name END AS name FROM (Select * FROM sequence_use_department WHERE seq_code=#{code}) t1 LEFT JOIN company t2 ON t1.use_id = t2.comp_id LEFT JOIN establishment t3 ON t1.use_id = t3.est_id LEFT JOIN department t4 ON t1.use_id = t4.dept_id LEFT JOIN user t5 ON t1.use_id = t5.user_id;
SELECT "F" AS category, fl.form_code AS useId, form_name AS name FROM (SELECT form_code FROM sequence_use_form WHERE seq_code=#{code}) fl LEFT JOIN form ON fl.form_code = form.form_code;
mapper.update: UPDATE sequence SET seq_del_status=1 WHERE seq_code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sequence(seq_code, comp_id, seq_name, seq_description, seq_sort_order, product_form) VALUES(#{code}, #{compId}, #{seqName}, #{description}, #{sortOrder}, #{seqString});
INSERT INTO sequence_use_department(status, seq_code, use_id) VALUES(#{category}, #{seqCode}, #{useId});
